UI::Dialogs::ZoomDialog

Detailed Description

The ZoomDialog class displays a small dialog box to prompt the user for an amount to zoom the image loaded into the editor.

Parameters:
ZoomLevel Contains the amount of zoom the user specifies.

Once the user hits the "Zoom Image" button, this grabs the value from the dialog box.
